title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - Contemporary Thali Bottu
features: A gracefully curved pendant featuring a delicate paisley motif rendered entirely in pavé-set diamonds. The design is a modern interpretation of traditional South Indian motifs, suitable for everyday wear while retaining cultural significance. The setting provides maximum brilliance and light return from each diamond.
colors: Rose Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: or as a contemporary twist on the traditional Mangalsutra for weddings.
description: This pendant is an elegant fusion of modern design and traditional symbolism.
